examples.chinese: 周六还在工作的打工狗
examples.translation: Wage slave dog still working on Saturday

examples.chinese: 我们打工狗没有休息,真是太摆烂了
examples.translation: We wage slaves have no rest, it's really too hopeless

examples.chinese: 哪个打工狗初一回单位上班,哦,原来是我自己
examples.translation: Which wage slave goes back to work on the first day of the New Year? Oh, it's myself
